definition: certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]
to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: The filings can be accessed electronically through the SEC website.
sentences.chinese: 通過證交會的網址可以查到這些檔案。

sentences.english: It is true that the SEC would never have done some of the things OFHEO did.
sentences.chinese: 的確，督察局乾的一些事，證交會絕不會幹。
一些人質疑證交會的時機選擇。

sentences.english: For more details on the SEC suit, see this blog post on my website.
sentences.chinese: 有關證交會起訴，更多詳情請到我的網站看相關博文。

sentences.english: This time to dismember the Goldman Sachs is under the SEC's hand.
sentences.chinese: 這回要肢解高盛，是美國證交會下的手。

sentences.english: Kotz is the only SEC employee set to testify.
sentences.chinese: 克茨是該聽證會上唯一的證交會僱員。
